name: Mystery Places - A hidden objects puzzle game
name_original: Mystery Places - A hidden objects puzzle game
description:
Explore fantastic scenes and find the mystery items. Search hidden object scenes, find clues, and collect them all.
GAME FEATURES:
Beautiful hidden object scenes in multiple locations such as old attics, gardens, people's rooms and other.
Build spectacular cities and bring the magical map to life!
Search each amazing items with handy skills like fast flash object and time freeze.
Collect bonus stars in order to unlock the skills.
Unlock mysterious rooms, and places.
Collect random objects! Each one is hidden in the most unexpected places.
Play for FREE!

20 Great levels with over 200 items, different scenes, and incredible skills.
This game is unique and so different from what you had played before.
Take your friends in this adventure and come an play Mystery Places! A hidden objects puzzle game!
